: : Rodimus Prime : :

Rodimus: Yes, I do. I trust this Megatron clone for some reason. Given the situation the Maximals needed some muscle as well.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Hydras:

"I'll be expecting that moment"hissed the male and looking to 
Rodimus "Well old pal, I can't understand how did you acccepted him 
in your ranks... he still a decepticon and if I remember rightly you 
have a family to care... "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Megatron Revived:
>  
> The clone growled then lowered his weapon.
> "We will meet again," he scoffed at Hydras, then transformed into 
a gunship and took off for base.
>
